dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, I was just looking at this article about Kaspi.kz, right? They had this big meeting with, like, the President of Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, I was just looking at this article about Kaspi.kz, right? They had this big meeting with, like, the President of Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, the founders and President discussed Kaspi.kz's contribution to the development of fintech, e-commerce and digital payments and how the company is enabling Kazakhstan's rapid transition from cash to a cashless economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah? What was, um, on the agenda there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah? What was, um, on the agenda there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it sounds like they were talking about their massive role in, you know, fintech, e-commerce, and digital payments. Like, really pushing Kazakhstan towards a cashless economy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it sounds like they were talking about their massive role in, you know, fintech, e-commerce, and digital payments. Like, really pushing Kazakhstan towards a cashless economy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, the founders and President discussed Kaspi.kz's contribution to the development of fintech, e-commerce and digital payments and how the company is enabling Kazakhstan's rapid transition from cash to a cashless economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, uh, pretty significant, isn't it? I mean, going from cash to totally digital is a huge leap for any country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is, uh, pretty significant, isn't it? I mean, going from cash to totally digital is a huge leap for any country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And, um, Vyacheslav Kim, the Chairman, he mentioned how they've transformed from just a retail bank into this massive tech platform and mobile ecosystem.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And, um, Vyacheslav Kim, the Chairman, he mentioned how they've transformed from just a retail bank into this massive tech platform and mobile ecosystem.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting we discussed our transformation from a leading retail bank into the country's largest technology platform and mobile ecosystem commented Vyacheslav Kim, Chairman of the Board of Directors of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's wild. They're not just a bank anymore, they're, like, *the* app for everything. I heard their mobile app has, what, over 6 million users?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's wild. They're not just a bank anymore, they're, like, the app for everything. I heard their mobile app has, what, over six million users?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting we shared how our team is revolutionizing the way people pay, shop and manage their personal finances with our hugely popular Kaspi.kz Mobile App, which currently has over 6 million users and has become an integral part of their daily lives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! It's become, uh, an integral part of daily life there, apparently. And they're not just focusing on consumers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! It's become, uh, an integral part of daily life there, apparently. And they're not just focusing on consumers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: our hugely popular Kaspi.kz Mobile App, which currently has over 6 million users and has become an integral part of their daily lives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, like, they're also supporting SMEs, right? Small and medium-sized businesses, with new financing and payment products. That's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, like, they're also supporting S M E s, right? Small and medium-sized businesses, with new financing and payment products. That's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz's strategy to support the growth of SME's with new financing and payments products was also in focus.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. They've already provided, get this, over 2 billion tenge in the last two months alone to help these businesses grow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. They've already provided, get this, over two billion tenge in the last two months alone to help these businesses grow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 2 billion tenge has already been provided to SMEs to help fund their growth in just the last two months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Which is, um, incredibly fast! And they're expanding their payment infrastructure too, from twenty thousand POS terminals to, like, thirty-five thousand? That's huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is, um, incredibly fast! And they're expanding their payment infrastructure too, from twenty thousand P O S terminals to, like, thirty-five thousand? That's huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the end of 2019, Kaspi.kz rolled out modern payments infrastructure, including 20 000 POS Terminals and plans to increase this to 35 000 in 2020.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it really shows their commitment. Mikhail Lomtadze, the CEO, even said their mission is to develop innovative services that improve people's lives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it really shows their commitment. Mikhail Lomtadze, the C E O, even said their mission is to develop innovative services that improve people's lives.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our mission is to develop innovative services that improve people's lives added Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And it seems like they're really doing it. They even, uh, thanked the President for a three-year income tax holiday for micro and small businesses. That's massive support.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it seems like they're really doing it. They even, uh, thanked the President for a three-year income tax holiday for micro and small businesses. That's massive support.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz founders expressed gratitude to the President on behalf of entrepreneurs for providing a 3-year income tax holiday for micro and small businesses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that decision alone is a huge investment in the country's economic future, especially for, like, cashless payments and small biz development.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that decision alone is a huge investment in the country's economic future, especially for, like, cashless payments and small biz development.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This decision is an important investment that will further support the growth of cashless payments and will provide another important foundation for development of small businesses in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, they're not just staying local. They updated the President on their plans for an IPO on the London Stock Exchange and, um, the Astana International Exchange.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, they're not just staying local. They updated the President on their plans for an I P O on the London Stock Exchange and, um, the Astana International Exchange.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The founders of Kaspi.kz also updated the President on Kaspi.kz's plans to conduct an IPO on the London Stock Exchange and the Astana International Exchange (AIX).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Big moves! The President even noted how important Kaspi.kz's technological innovations are for the country. Pretty impressive, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Big moves! The President even noted how important Kaspi.kz's technological innovations are for the country. Pretty impressive, honestly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted the importance to the country of the technological innovations continually being pioneered by Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. They're really changing the game over there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. They're really changing the game over there.
